rude.print: ???: Hello, I’d like to reserve a room.
You: Okay, which tier would you like?
???: Should I repeat that? You seem slow.
You: And how many days will you be staying?
Harriet: 2 nights, ugh. Your attention span is on the same caliber of a goldfish.
Harriet: I swear I’m the only one on this planet that functions properly.
Harriet: And that room better have 3 ply toilet paper.
You: We only carry 2 ply, sorry.
Harriet: Bah! Nevermind, I can’t stay in this dirt hole.
